mapper.select: SELECT illustno, illust, illust_saved, illust_thumb, illust_size, conversationno FROM illustration ORDER BY illustno DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE illustration SET illust = #{illust}, illust_saved = #{illust_saved}, illust_thumb = #{illust_thumb}, illust_size = #{illust_size} WHERE illustno = #{illustno}
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT i.illustno, i.illust, i.illust_saved, i.illust_thumb, i.illust_size, i.conversationno FROM illustration i LEFT JOIN diary d ON i.illustno = d.illustno WHERE 1=1
AND (TRUNC(d.ddate) >= TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
AND (TRUNC(d.ddate) <= TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
ORDER BY i.illustno DESC

SELECT i.illustno, i.illust, i.illust_saved, i.illust_thumb, i.illust_size, i.conversationno FROM illustration i WHERE 1=1
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM diary d WHERE i.illustno = d.illustno AND TRUNC(d.ddate) >= TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM diary d WHERE i.illustno = d.illustno AND TRUNC(d.ddate) <= TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') )
ORDER BY i.illustno DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM illustration i INNER JOIN diary d ON i.illustno = d.illustno WHERE 1=1
AND TRUNC(d.ddate) >= TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TRUNC(d.ddate) <= TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM ( SELECT i.illustno, i.illust, i.illust_saved, i.illust_thumb, i.illust_size, i.conversationno FROM illustration i INNER JOIN diary d ON i.illustno = d.illustno WHERE 1=1
AND TRUNC(d.ddate) >= TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TRUNC(d.ddate) <= TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY d.ddate DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endNum} ) WHERE rnum >= #{startNum}

SELECT i.illustno, i.illust, d.ddate AS diaryDate FROM illustration i LEFT JOIN diary d ON i.illustno = d.illustno WHERE 1=1
AND TRUNC(d.ddate) >= TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TRUNC(d.ddate) <= TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY i.illustno DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM illustration i LEFT JOIN diary d ON i.illustno = d.illustno WHERE 1=1
AND TRUNC(d.ddate) >= TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TRUNC(d.ddate) <= TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM illustration i LEFT JOIN diary d ON i.illustno = d.illustno WHERE d.ddate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
